name: LMS Wellness
slogan: A members-only medical wellness retreat in London
description:
Founded by the renowned Dr Vali and Dr Enayat, LMS Wellness is the world’s best kept secret. A members-only medical wellness spa that encapsulates the perfect synergy between artistry and medical excellence.

Dr. Vali, who Harper's Bazaar Arabia refers to as "The Woman Behind The World’s Most Beautiful" and Dr. Enayat, who is pioneering in biohacking and functional medicine, have created innovative protocols while incorporating effective cutting-edge technologies. Joined by a global team of specialists, LMS Wellness is recognised for experience-led immersive client care and holistic health management.

Our by invitation only client base spans royalty, Victoria's Secret Models and CEOs. We place our members at the very core of what we do. Listening, understanding and supporting our members by taking them on a curated journey to optimal vitality, enables them to reach their full potential and lead a more fulfilled life.

team.name: Dr. Shawana Vali
team.bioHtml: Dr. Vali, The Woman Behind The World’s Most Beautiful - Harper's Bazaar Arabia

jobs.title: Business Development Manager
jobs.description:
This role will be focused on supporting the senior management team to take the company into an unprecedented and significant period of profit growth. It will require you to find and win new business and report to the CEO yet have a high degree of autonomy.

This is a role for an experienced Business Development Manager who knows how to generate significant new revenue in the short, mid and long-term, extract maximal revenue from current streams and has the ability to confidently drive client and brand partners.You will think like the founder of a start-up and manage the business relationships whilst gaining new business to increase company revenue/profits. We are looking for a smart marketer who wants to build a brand or has experience in building a successful brand as well as scale it up.

You should be holding your own black book and be confident to introduce your key contacts to the brand. The successful candidate will be reporting to the CEO.

Responsibilities

- Drive the business development from a B2C and B2B side

- Ensure sales targets are met month on month by liaising with the Clinical Client Concierge, the Clinic Manager and the General Manager.

- Utilise our existing ambassadors to reach sales targets and cultivate new relationships with key players within the luxury sector to grow your network

- Ensure company growth-targets are met every quarter

- Work with the wider management team to successfully find new B2B collaborations for brand value and revenue streams

- Plan and manage events to increase brand value, drive acquisition and increase overall sales

- Develop partnerships with other organisations and key players in the luxury sector in order to exceed KPI’s

- Be creative when finding new business partner and have solution orientated attitude

- Act as an entrepreneurial business owner and promote brand advocacy

jobs.title: Social Media Manager
jobs.description:
This role will be focused on supporting the Medical Directors in executing the social media strategy and optimizing the overall social media presence of the brand. The role will require both creative- and organisational skills; switching between content creation, planning, scheduling and compiling reports. You will be part of the day-to-day activities in our London Flagship location and create thumb stopping social-first imagery and video, acting as the gatekeeper to our social media calendar and be partaking in the coverage of all our events and activities.

- Oversee social media accounts (Instagram, YouTube, Facebook)

- Planning social content and maintaining the content calendar ensuring
social media content is regular, relevant and engaging

- Weekly reporting on social media activates with an overall monthly report on engagement

- Monitoring the success of the community and of social media in terms of the overall marketing strategy

- Propose innovative campaigns to extend brand presence socially, drive traffic to website, and increase engagement and loyalty

- Work within and across teams/business units to ensure campaigns are supported through all appropriate digital channels and platforms

- On a regular basis, identify issues, patterns and trends in consumer comments/inquiries and funnel information to the appropriate departments

- Use analytical skills to plan, evaluate and optimize campaigns

- Coordinate community management: manage and grow our online community as well as drive online conversation and conversion

- Research and present key social media developments, digital trends, and emerging talent and influencers, becoming an authority on the fast-paced pulse of social media

- Benchmark against key competitors and inspiring campaigns and use data and insights to inform strategy- and channel optimization

- Become the gatekeeper for our demanding weekly calendar, coordinating with internal and external stakeholders regarding key opportunities and stories
